name: appmixer.google.drive.CreateFolder
author: David Durman <david@client.io>
description: Create a new folder in your drive.

folderName.label: New Folder Name
folderName.tooltip: Enter the name for your new folder.

folderLocation.label: New Folder Location
folderLocation.tooltip: Select the parent folder for your new folder. Leave blank to create the folder in the root of your drive.

useExisting.label: Use Existing
useExisting.tooltip: If a folder with the same name already exists, return the existing folder instead of creating a new one.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file.
mimeType.title: GDrive Folder.MIME Type

description.description: A short description of the file.
description.title: GDrive Folder.Description

starred.description: Whether the file has been starred by the user.
starred.title: GDrive Folder.Starred

trashed.description: Whether the file has been trashed.
trashed.title: GDrive Folder.Trashed

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string 'drive#file'.
kind.title: GDrive Folder.Kind

webViewLink.description: A link for opening the file in a relevant Google editor or viewer in a browser.
webViewLink.title: GDrive Folder.Web View Link

webContentLink.description: A link for downloading the content of the file in a browser.
webContentLink.title: GDrive Folder.Web Content Link

iconLink.description: A link to the file's icon.
iconLink.title: GDrive Folder.Icon Link

thumbnailLink.description: A short-lived link to the file's thumbnail, if available.
thumbnailLink.title: GDrive Folder.Thumbnail Link

exportLinks.title: GDrive Folder.Export Links
exportLinks.description: Links for exporting Docs Editors files to specific formats.

copyRequiresWriterPermission.title: GDrive Folder.Copy Requires Writer Permission
copyRequiresWriterPermission.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download this file, should be disabled for readers and commenters.

isAppAuthorized.description: Whether the file was created or opened by the requesting app.
isAppAuthorized.title: GDrive Folder.Is App Authorized

hasAugmentedPermissions.description: Whether there are permissions directly on this file.
hasAugmentedPermissions.title: GDrive Folder.Has Augmented Permissions

originalFilename.description: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Google Drive.
originalFilename.title: GDrive Folder.Original Filename

explicitlyTrashed.description: Whether the file has been explicitly trashed.
explicitlyTrashed.title: GDrive Folder.Explicitly Trashed

parents.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file.
parents.title: GDrive Folder.Parents

spaces.description: The spaces which contain the file.
spaces.title: GDrive Folder.Spaces

permissionIds.description: List of permission IDs for users with access to this file.
permissionIds.title: GDrive Folder.Permission IDs

version.description: A monotonically increasing version number for the file.
version.title: GDrive Folder.Version

folderColorRgb.description: The color for a folder or a shortcut to a folder as an RGB hex string.
folderColorRgb.title: GDrive Folder.Folder Color RGB

resourceKey.description: A key needed to access the item via a shared link.
resourceKey.title: GDrive Folder.Resource Key

securityUpdateEligible.title: GDrive Folder.Link Share Metadata.Security Update Eligible

securityUpdateEnabled.title: GDrive Folder.Link Share Metadata.Security Update Enabled

linkShareMetadata.description: Contains details about the link URLs that clients are using to refer to this item.
linkShareMetadata.title: GDrive Folder.Link Share Metadata

labelInfo.description: An overview of the labels on the file.
labelInfo.title: GDrive Folder.Label Info

hasThumbnail.description: Whether the file has a thumbnail.
hasThumbnail.title: GDrive Folder.Has Thumbnail

thumbnailVersion.description: The thumbnail version for use in thumbnail cache invalidation.
thumbnailVersion.title: GDrive Folder.Thumbnail Version

trashedTime.description: The time that the item was trashed.
trashedTime.title: GDrive Folder.Trashed Time

fullFileExtension.description: The full file extension extracted from the name field. May contain multiple concatenated extensions, such as "tar.gz". This is only available for files with binary content in Google Drive.
fullFileExtension.title: GDrive Folder.Full File Extension

viewedByMe.description: Whether the file has been viewed by the user.
viewedByMe.title: GDrive Folder.Viewed By Me

ownedByMe.description: Whether the user owns the file.
ownedByMe.title: GDrive Folder.Owned By Me

viewedByMeTime.description: The last time the file was viewed by the user.
viewedByMeTime.title: GDrive Folder.Viewed By Me Time

createdTime.description: The time at which the file was created.
createdTime.title: GDrive Folder.Created Time

modifiedTime.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone.
modifiedTime.title: GDrive Folder.Modified Time

modifiedByMeTime.description: The last time the file was modified by the user.
modifiedByMeTime.title: GDrive Folder.Modified By Me Time

modifiedByMe.description: Whether the file has been modified by this user.
modifiedByMe.title: GDrive Folder.Modified By

sharedWithMeTime.description: The time at which the file was shared with the user.
sharedWithMeTime.title: GDrive Folder.Shared With Me Time

quotaBytesUsed.description: The number of storage quota bytes used by the file.
quotaBytesUsed.title: GDrive Folder.Quota Bytes Used

restrictingUser.description: The user who applied the restriction.

photoLink.description: A link to the user's profile photo.

me.description: Whether this is the authenticated user.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user.

restrictionTime.description: The time when the restriction was applied.

ownerRestricted.description: Whether the owner applied the restriction.

systemRestricted.description: Whether the restriction was applied by the system.

targetId.title: GDrive Folder.Shortcut Details.Target ID
targetId.description: The ID of the target file.

targetMimeType.title: GDrive Folder.Shortcut Details.Target MIME Type
targetMimeType.description: The MIME type of the target file.

targetResourceKey.title: GDrive Folder.Shortcut Details.Target Resource Key
targetResourceKey.description: The resource key of the target file.

width.title: GDrive Folder.Video Media Metadata.Width
width.description: The width of the video in pixels.

height.title: GDrive Folder.Video Media Metadata.Height
height.description: The height of the video in pixels.

durationMillis.title: GDrive Folder.Video Media Metadata.Duration Millis
durationMillis.description: The duration of the video in milliseconds.

flashUsed.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Flash Used
flashUsed.description: Indicates whether the flash was used.

width.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Width
width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

height.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Height
height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

latitude.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Location.Latitude
latitude.description: The latitude where the photo was taken.

longitude.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Location.Longitude
longitude.description: The longitude where the photo was taken.

altitude.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Location.Altitude
altitude.description: The altitude where the photo was taken.

rotation.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Rotation
rotation.description: The rotation of the image in degrees.

time.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Time
time.description: The time the photo was taken.

focalLength.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Focal Length
focalLength.description: The focal length of the lens in millimeters.

maxApertureValue.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Max Aperture Value

subjectDistance.title: GDrive Folder.Image Media Metadata.Subject Distance
subjectDistance.description: The distance to the subject in meters.

canChangeViewersCanCopyContent.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Change Viewers Can Copy Content
canChangeViewersCanCopyContent.description: Whether the user can change if viewers can copy content.

canMoveChildrenOutOfDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Children Out Of Drive
canMoveChildrenOutOfDrive.description: Whether the user can move children out of Google Drive.

canReadDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Read Drive
canReadDrive.description: Whether the user can read the Drive.

canEdit.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Edit
canEdit.description: Whether the user can edit the file.

canCopy.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Copy
canCopy.description: Whether the user can copy the file.

canComment.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Comment
canComment.description: Whether the user can comment on the file.

canAddChildren.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Add Children
canAddChildren.description: Whether the user can add children to the file.

canDelete.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Delete
canDelete.description: Whether the user can delete the file.

canDownload.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Download
canDownload.description: Whether the user can download the file.

canListChildren.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can List Children
canListChildren.description: Whether the user can list children of the file.

canRemoveChildren.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Remove Children
canRemoveChildren.description: Whether the user can remove children from the file.

canRename.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Rename
canRename.description: Whether the user can rename the file.

canTrash.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Trash
canTrash.description: Whether the user can move the file to trash.

canReadRevisions.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Read Revisions
canReadRevisions.description: Whether the user can read revisions of the file.

canReadTeamDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Read Team Drive
canReadTeamDrive.description: Whether the user can read the Team Drive.

canMoveTeamDriveItem.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Team Drive Item
canMoveTeamDriveItem.description: Whether the user can move items within Team Drive.

canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermission.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Change Copy Requires Writer Permission
canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermission.description: Whether the user can change the setting that copy requires writer permission.

canMoveItemIntoTeamDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Item Into Team Drive
canMoveItemIntoTeamDrive.description: Whether the user can move the item into Team Drive.

canUntrash.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Untrash
canUntrash.description: Whether the user can restore the file from trash.

canModifyContent.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Modify Content
canModifyContent.description: Whether the user can modify the content of the file.

canMoveItemWithinTeamDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Item Within Team Drive
canMoveItemWithinTeamDrive.description: Whether the user can move the item within Team Drive.

canMoveItemOutOfTeamDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Item Out Of Team Drive
canMoveItemOutOfTeamDrive.description: Whether the user can move the item out of Team Drive.

canDeleteChildren.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Delete Children
canDeleteChildren.description: Whether the user can delete children of the file.

canMoveChildrenOutOfTeamDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Children Out Of Team Drive
canMoveChildrenOutOfTeamDrive.description: Whether the user can move children out of Team Drive.

canMoveChildrenWithinTeamDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Children Within Team Drive
canMoveChildrenWithinTeamDrive.description: Whether the user can move children within Team Drive.

canTrashChildren.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Trash Children
canTrashChildren.description: Whether the user can move children to trash.

canMoveItemOutOfDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Item Out Of Drive
canMoveItemOutOfDrive.description: Whether the user can move the item out of Google Drive.

canAddMyDriveParent.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Add My Drive Parent
canAddMyDriveParent.description: Whether the user can add a My Drive parent to the file.

canRemoveMyDriveParent.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Remove My Drive Parent
canRemoveMyDriveParent.description: Whether the user can remove a My Drive parent from the file.

canMoveItemWithinDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Item Within Drive
canMoveItemWithinDrive.description: Whether the user can move the item within Google Drive.

canShare.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Share
canShare.description: Whether the user can share the file.

canMoveChildrenWithinDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Move Children Within Drive
canMoveChildrenWithinDrive.description: Whether the user can move children within Google Drive.

canModifyContentRestriction.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Modify Content Restriction
canModifyContentRestriction.description: Whether the user can modify content restrictions.

canAddFolderFromAnotherDrive.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Add Folder From Another Drive
canAddFolderFromAnotherDrive.description: Whether the user can add a folder from another Drive.

canChangeSecurityUpdateEnabled.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Change Security Update Enabled
canChangeSecurityUpdateEnabled.description: Whether the user can change the security update setting.

canAcceptOwnership.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Accept Ownership
canAcceptOwnership.description: Whether the user can accept ownership of the file.

canReadLabels.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Read Labels
canReadLabels.description: Whether the user can read labels on the file.

canModifyLabels.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Modify Labels
canModifyLabels.description: Whether the user can modify labels on the file.

canModifyEditorContentRestriction.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Modify Editor Content Restriction
canModifyEditorContentRestriction.description: Whether the user can modify editor content restrictions.

canModifyOwnerContentRestriction.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Modify Owner Content Restriction
canModifyOwnerContentRestriction.description: Whether the user can modify owner content restrictions.

canRemoveContentRestriction.title: GDrive Folder.Capabilities.Can Remove Content Restriction
canRemoveContentRestriction.description: Whether the user can remove content restrictions.

lastModifyingUser.title: GDrive Folder.Last Modifying User
lastModifyingUser.description: The user who last modified the file.

sharingUser.title: GDrive Folder.Sharing User
sharingUser.description: The user who shared the file with the requesting user, if applicable.

trashingUser.title: GDrive Folder.Trashing User
trashingUser.description: If the file has been explicitly trashed, the user who trashed it.

shared.title: GDrive Folder.Shared
shared.description: Whether the file has been shared.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string 'drive#user'.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

photoLink.description: A link to the user's profile photo, if available.

me.description: Whether this user is the authenticated user for whom the request is being made.

permissionId.description: The user's ID as visible in Permission resources.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user.
